attributes.action: EXTEND the GRANTS to all the INELIGIBLE SELF EMPLOYED left behind
attributes.background: Overturn the wrong that's been done and pay all the self employed left behind since march 2020. Where has Human rights and Equality gone.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might also like to sign the following petitions:

Extend income replacement schemes to those who don't currently qualify
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560845

Change eligibility to Self-Employment Income Support Scheme to a gradated scale
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323780

Remove the 50% Self Employed Rule for those with a P45 dated before UK Lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552425
